projects.title: $18M Multi-Building Modernization Liaison & Validation
projects.summary: Coordinated cross-vendor delivery across multiple buildings, translating between technical teams and stakeholders while validating milestones and readiness.

sections.problem: Multiple workstreams had conflicting handoff criteria and fragmented communications, putting schedule confidence at risk.
sections.constraints: Sanitized stakeholder communications, fixed reporting cadence, and phased occupancy windows.
actions: Created a single validation checklist for all vendors.
Ran weekly risk triage with issue aging dashboards.
Introduced sign-off gates for each phase and building.
results: Improved acceptance pass rate from 71% to 94%.
Kept final phases within approved tolerance windows.
next_steps: Automate status ingestion from vendor exports.
Add readiness heatmap by floor and system.

projects.title: M365 & Endpoint Standardization Blueprint
projects.summary: Defined baseline policy packs and deployment sequences for identity, endpoint, and collaboration reliability across distributed teams.

sections.problem: Endpoint and productivity experiences were inconsistent due to policy drift and uneven provisioning.
sections.constraints: Legacy device mix, hybrid identity dependencies, and staggered support maturity.
actions: Built pilot ring strategy with rollback paths.
Aligned documentation and service desk runbooks.
results: Improved first-week user experience survey scores.
next_steps: Integrate release notes digest for frontline support.

projects.title: VoIP, UC & Rooms Support Stabilization
projects.summary: Improved support reliability for calling and meeting rooms through proactive health checks and standardized escalation patterns.

sections.problem: Rooms support had frequent last-minute failures and unclear ownership in incidents.
sections.constraints: Mixed hardware generations and nonuniform room refresh cycles.
actions: Defined priority matrix for executive and event rooms.
Created a rapid fallback decision tree for audio paths.
next_steps: Deploy standardized spare kit per location.

projects.title: AV Live Production Reliability Checklist
projects.summary: Template used before high-stakes streams and hybrid events to reduce avoidable production issues.

sections.problem: Event teams lacked a concise preflight artifact that covered technical and communication checkpoints.
sections.constraints: Short prep windows and rotating staffing patterns.
actions: Grouped checks by T-48h, T-4h, and T-30m.
Included cue and contingency communication prompts.
results: Improved confidence of producers and presenters.

projects.title: Vendor Scoring Sheet
projects.summary: Weighted evaluation template for comparing service providers by capability, responsiveness, and operational fit.

sections.problem: Selection discussions were subjective and hard to audit.
sections.constraints: Need for sanitized criteria and repeatable rubric.
actions: Added tie-breaker guidance for near scores.
next_steps: Connect scoring output to onboarding checklist.

projects.title: Incident & Runbook Communications Template
projects.summary: Reusable communication structure for incident declaration, updates, and closure messages.

sections.problem: Inconsistent incident updates caused confusion across technical and nontechnical audiences.
sections.constraints: Must remain concise while preserving timeline accuracy.
actions: Mapped update frequency to severity tiers.
next_steps: Add translated variants for global teams.

projects.title: Endpoint / MDM Policy Lab
projects.summary: Lab environment for testing enrollment flows, conditional access interactions, and policy impact before production rollout.

sections.problem: Policy changes needed safer validation before broad deployment.
sections.constraints: Small device pool and limited test windows.
next_steps: Increase device diversity in the lab.

projects.title: UC / Teams Rooms Validation Lab
projects.summary: Small-scale reproducible room lab to verify firmware, peripheral compatibility, and room profile standards.

sections.problem: Room releases occasionally introduced regressions not caught in staging.
sections.constraints: Vendors shipped updates at different cadences.
actions: Captured AV quality metrics per update.

projects.title: Photography Contact Sheet
projects.summary: Curated grid of editorial and environmental photo studies used in creative and brand storytelling workflows.

sections.problem: Needed a concise visual archive for selecting style directions.
sections.constraints: Placeholder samples only; no client-identifiable visuals.
actions: Grouped by lighting profile and mood.
Added quick notes for tone and framing.

projects.title: Video & Editing Highlights Reel
projects.summary: Shot list snapshots and sequence notes showing pacing, transitions, and visual narrative rhythm.

sections.problem: Needed a portable highlights package for showcasing editing style.
sections.constraints: Sanitized footage and royalty-free placeholders only.
actions: Selected short scenes by energy profile.
results: Better fit discussions for creative briefs.

projects.title: How I Communicate During Incidents
projects.summary: Writing sample on clarity-first incident communication and how to keep updates useful under pressure.

sections.problem: Teams asked for a practical framework on incident language and update cadence.
sections.constraints: Must be concise and easy to reuse in real operations.

projects.title: Operations Runbook Library
projects.summary: Structured template library for recurring ops workflows with owner fields, trigger conditions, and escalation paths.

sections.problem: Runbooks varied in quality and made handoffs inconsistent.
sections.constraints: Need lightweight format that teams would actually maintain.
actions: Added review cadence and stale-content flags.
Provided starter templates by incident type.

projects.title: Service Intake & Prioritization Template
projects.summary: Single intake form and triage model for categorizing requests by urgency, impact, and required dependencies.

sections.problem: Incoming requests lacked consistent details, slowing planning and execution.
sections.constraints: Needed quick adoption with minimal training overhead.

projects.title: Automation Scripting Lab
projects.summary: Prototype scripts for repeated endpoint and reporting tasks, with guardrails for dry-run validation.

sections.problem: Manual repetitive tasks were consuming frontline support capacity.
sections.constraints: Needed safe rollback and transparent change logs.
actions: Built script templates with dry-run mode.
Documented peer review checklist for scripts.
next_steps: Automate lint and style checks for scripts.

projects.title: Brand System Web Refresh
projects.summary: Refined layout cadence and type hierarchy for a cleaner, editorial web experience across portfolio content.

sections.problem: Visual language was inconsistent and diluted content priority.
sections.constraints: Retain minimalist palette and avoid decorative clutter.
actions: Defined spacing and section rhythm tokens.
results: Improved perceived quality of work samples.

projects.title: Hybrid Event Signal Map
projects.summary: Technical signal-flow diagram and staffing plan for hybrid events with backup paths and fallback assignments.

sections.problem: Complex hybrid events were vulnerable to single-path failures.
sections.constraints: Tight change windows and multiple third-party contributors.
actions: Documented primary and backup signal routes.
Rehearsed fallback transitions with timed drills.

projects.title: Knowledge Base Writing Style Guide
projects.summary: A concise writing guide for support and engineering docs, focused on tone, structure, and maintenance discipline.

sections.problem: Documentation quality varied widely across contributors.
sections.constraints: Needed fast contributor onboarding with minimal governance overhead.
next_steps: Add quick-start checklist for new authors.
